item.description:
When: Tuesday, March 29, 8 - 9 PM

Where: Phone: 218-339-4600 Access Code: 488095#
( you just pay for the long distance call )

[b]Ann & Mark Ide[/b], presenters at our MARCH Meetup, are back with us, this time on the phone. 

Bring your burning questions re:

- how to integrate LoA powerfully in your daily activities &

- how to come from a place of your "TRUE YOU"
(the surest & fastest way to create the success, the joy that you truly want.)

 

RECORDING of March Meetup:

Ann & Mark had a presentation on similar topic re: "Surest Way to Manifesting the TRUE Life, Success & Happiness You Want" at their MetroWest March Meetp. Since the recording was clear & awesome, they've gifted it to all of us to review. Do listen to the guided meditations to deepen your connection with your TRUE YOU!


"Chime in" from 8 - 9 PM on the phone ...

- with your questions

- to get support & suggestions

- to share your LoA journey

Thank you very much, Ann & Mark, for your gift of wisdom & time this evening.

*******************************************************

About Ann & Mark Ide:
www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com

Ann is a certified master practitioner in Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) & Hypnotherapy, & a certified NLP Life Coach. She coaches people to move beyond struggles & mere survival, to thrive in harmony, happiness & success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes & personal change interventions, clients become emotionally & spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness & well-being they want. 

Mark has been a successful business consultant for over 20 years, using his skills to bring greater harmony, happiness & success to the workplace. He is a certified master professional leadership & management coach.

In addition to leading guided meditation classes, business workshops, & coaching private clients, Ann & Mark co-lead the Metro West Law of Attraction Meetup & their 13 week New Possibilities Group Coaching Program.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: TELE-Meetup: Masterminding with Ann & Mark Ide
